description: Buy-in for creating a fair, resilient and flourishing Singapore is challenging amid concerns about rising costs. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Budget 2024: Three principles to strengthen support for Forward Singapore initiatives
title_page: Budget 2024: Three principles to strengthen support for Forward Singapore initiatives | The Straits Times
maintext:
Singapore will be tuning in to the Budget 2024 statement by Deputy Prime Minister and Finance Minister Lawrence Wong on Feb 16.
There is clear indication of the social transformation it must fund after the fourth-generation (4G) leaders launched the Forward Singapore report in November 2023.
